header.title: EDoc command line interface

description.p: This script is a command line entry point to both edoc:application/2 and edoc:files/2 functions. It also allows to generate just the EEP-48 doc chunks (using the -chunks flag) instead of the complete HTML documentation.

desc.p: EDoc is invoked via edoc:application/2, with the default set of options. If -chunks is given, then only doc chunks will be generated, not the full HTML documentation.
Run the script with no arguments to get the full list of options.

func.name: edoc -files <erl_file>... [-chunks]
func.fsummary: Run EDoc on the given Erlang source files.

desc.p: EDoc is invoked via edoc:files/2, with the default set of options. If -chunks is given, then only doc chunks will be generated, not the full HTML documentation.
Run the script with no arguments to get the full list of options.
